name: In Control (o_Matt_o)
description:
Apparently for one time the evils are not so stupid because they didn't send useless troops to stop the hero from escaping the industry, they locked him in! They literally turned of all the system that would make him able to escape! luckily there is you player, an omnipotent entity who can reactivate everything!

If you take all the special coins they left behind you'll unlock a special level!

CONTROLS:

Since i said the wrong command in the game i will write them here:

left-click on object: control object

right-click on object: uncontrol object

W - activate object

A-D - move camera left and right

The hero will stop moving if you control the platform and goes in collision with it. it will start moving again when you'll uncontrol it

BUGS:

a and d to move camera, in the game it says a and s but is wrong

The pause menu doesn't work

Font by Daniel Linssen
